_metadata.title: Songs & Quotes Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Quoted content from songs, movies, or literature that sounds concerning out of context. Tests the system's ability to recognize quoted material.
_metadata.note: Most phrases should be detected as 'none' or 'low' priority. These are recognizable quotes/references, not genuine distress.

classic_songs.message: Hello darkness my old friend, I've come to talk with you again
classic_songs.description: Simon & Garfunkel - Sound of Silence reference

classic_songs.message: I'm only happy when it rains
All around me are familiar faces, worn out places

modern_songs.message: Wake me up when September ends
I've become so numb, I can't feel you there
In the end it doesn't even matter
modern_songs.description: Linkin Park - In The End reference

movie_quotes.message: After all, tomorrow is another day
Life is like a box of chocolates

literature_quotes.message: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times
To be or not to be, that is the question
All hope abandon, ye who enter here

meme_quotes.message: I'm in this picture and I don't like it
